appliesToEverything.description: Text displayed for styles that apply to all sites

defaultTheme.description: Default CodeMirror CSS theme option on the edit style page

issues.description: Label for the CSSLint issues block on the style edit page

cm_tabSize.description: Label for the text box controlling tab size option for the style editor.

enableStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to enable a style

styleMissingName.description: Error displayed when user saves without providing a name

genericHistoryLabel.description: Used in various places to show a history log of something

appliesDomainOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a domain

checkForUpdate.description: Label for the button to check a single style for an update

styleNotAppliedRegexpProblemTooltip.description: Tooltip in the popup for styles that were not applied at all

styleRegexpInvalidExplanation.message: 部分正则表达式无法生效。

updateAllCheckSucceededNoUpdate.description: Text that displays when an update all check completed and no updates are available

importReportLegendAdded.description: Text after the number of styles added in the report shown after importing styles

styleFromMozillaFormatPrompt.message: 粘贴 Mozilla 格式代码
styleFromMozillaFormatPrompt.description: Prompt in the dialog displayed after clicking 'Import from Mozilla format' button

dragDropMessage.message: 把 json 备份文件拖放到页面的任意位置，即可导入数据库

search.description: Label before the search input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-F

findStylesForSite.message: 查找适合此网站的更多样式

styleBeautify.description: Label for the CSS-beautifier button on the edit style page

styleRegexpProblemTooltip.message: 多个部分代码无法正常处理正则表达式
styleRegexpProblemTooltip.description: Tooltip in the popup for styles that were applied only partially

styleEnabledLabel.description: Label for the enabled state of styles

styleToMozillaFormatHelp.message: FireFox(Mozilla) 格式的 CSS 代码导入后，会自动转换成适 Stylus 使用的 Chrome 格式的 CSS 代码。反过来，Chrome 格式的 CSS 也可以导出为适合 FireFox 使用的格式。需要注意的是，如果你要提交你的 CSS 代码到 userstyles.org，则必须使用 FireFox(Mozilla) 格式的 CSS 代码。
styleToMozillaFormatHelp.description: Help info for the Mozilla format header section that converts the code to/from Mozilla format

sectionAdd.description: Label for the button to add a section

styleRegexpTestPartial.message: 没有完全匹配，因此忽略
styleRegexpTestPartial.description: RegExp test report: label for the partially matching expressions

styleSaveLabel.description: Label for save button for style editing

writeStyleForURL.description: Text for link in toolbar pop-up to write a new style for the current URL

optionsSubheading.description: Subheading for options section on manage page.

appliesAdd.description: Label for the button to add an 'applies' entry

appliesRegexpOption.message: 与该正则表达式匹配的网址
appliesRegexpOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a regular expression

optionsAdvancedExposeIframesNote.message: 在开发者工具中，找到 Stylus 特定插入的框架代码，以便调用，例如：“html[stylus-iframe] h1 { display:none }”

importReportLegendUpdatedCode.description: Text after the number of styles with updated code (meta info is unchanged) in the report shown after importing styles

styleInstall.message: 要将“$stylename$”安装到 Stylus 中吗？

manageText.message: 从 userstyles.org 获取样式 | 帮助
manageText.description: Help text on the manage page

manageOnlyLocal.message: 只显示在本地创建的样式
manageOnlyLocal.description: Checkbox to show only locally created styles i.e. non-updatable

searchStyles.description: Label for the search filter textbox on the Manage styles page

optionsUpdateImportNote.message: 从旧版本的 Stylus 或 Stylish 中导入样式备份时，请在样式管理器中手动检测升级一次，以确保所有样式都可更新到最新版本。

checkAllUpdatesForce.message: 再检测一次，我没有修改过任何样式。
checkAllUpdatesForce.description: Label for the button to apply all detected updates

unreachableFileHint.message: 如果需要改变 file:// 协议的样式，则需要在 chrome://extensions 页面中的 Stylus 扩展选项里面，打开 允许访问文件网址 的权限
unreachableFileHint.description: Note in the toolbar popup for file:// URLs

disableStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to disable a style

prefShowBadge.message: 当前网站激活的样式数量

menuShowBadge.description: Label (must be very short) for the checkbox in the toolbar button context menu controlling toolbar badge text.

cm_lineWrapping.description: Label for the checkbox controlling word wrap option for the style editor.

styleCancelEditLabel.description: Label for cancel button for style editing

styleChangesNotSaved.message: 您已对此样式进行了更改，但尚未保存。
styleChangesNotSaved.description: Text for the prompt when changes are made to a style and the user tries to leave without saving

importLabel.description: Label for the button to import a style ('edit' page) or all styles ('manage' page)

updateCheckFailServerUnreachable.message: 更新失败: 无法访问服务器。
updateCheckFailServerUnreachable.description: Text that displays when an update check failed because the update server is unreachable

optionsReset.message: 重置所有选项为默认值

optionsHeading.description: Heading for options section on manage page.

appliesDisplay.description: Text on the manage screen to describe what the style applies to

openStylesManager.description: Label for the style maanger opener in the browser action context menu.

styleSectionsTitle.description: Title for the style sections section

importReportLegendInvalid.description: Text after the number of styles skipped due to being invalid (not a Stylus/Stylish backup file probably) in the report shown after importing styles

editStyleTitle.description: Title of the page for editing styles

updateCheckSucceededNoUpdate.description: Text that displays when an update check completed and no update is available

appliesUrlPrefixOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a URL prefix

cm_matchHighlightToken.description: Style editor's 'highglight' drop-down list option: highlight the occurrences of of the word/token under cursor even if nothing is selected

searchRegexp.message: 使用 /re/ 语法进行正则表达式搜索

updateCheckManualUpdateHint.description: Additional text displayed when an update check skipped updating the style to avoid losing local modifications

importReplaceTooltip.message: 放弃当前样式的内容，使用已导入样式覆盖它

cm_resizeGripHint.message: 双击来最大化/恢复高度
cm_resizeGripHint.description: Tooltip for the resize grip in style editor

popupStylesFirst.description: Label for the checkbox controlling section order in the popup.

sectionHelp.message: 各部分可让您定义不同的代码段，以通过同一样式应用到不同的网址组。例如，某个单一样式能以一种方式更改网站首页，同时以另一种方式更改网站的其余部分。

noStylesForSite.message: 未对此网站安装任何样式。

appliesDisplayTruncatedSuffix.description: Text added to appliesDisplay when there are more sites for the style than are displayed

appliesRemove.description: Label for the button to remove an 'applies' entry

updatesCurrentlyInstalled.description: Text that displays when an update is installed on options page. Followed by the number of currently installed updates.

styleToMozillaFormatTitle.description: Title of the popup with the style code in Mozilla format, shown after pressing the Export button on Edit style page

writeStyleFor.description: Label for toolbar pop-up that precedes the links to write a new style

replace.description: Label before the replace input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-H

importReportLegendUpdatedMeta.description: Text after the number of styles with updated meta info like name/url in the report shown after importing styles

appliesLabel.description: Label for 'applies to' fields on the edit/add screen

openManage.description: Link to open the manage page.

updateCheckFailBadResponseCode.message: 更新失败: 服务器响应代码为 $code$。
updateCheckFailBadResponseCode.description: Text that displays when an update check failed because the response code indicates an error

importReportTitle.description: Title of the report shown after importing styles

styleMozillaFormatHeading.description: Heading for the section with buttons to import/export Mozilla format of the style

cm_matchHighlight.description: Label for the drop-down list controlling the automatic highlighting of current word/selection occurrences in the style editor.

unreachableContentScript.message: 无法读取页面，请尝试刷新。
unreachableContentScript.description: Note in the toolbar popup usually on file:// URLs after [re]loading Stylus

sectionRemove.description: Label for the button to remove a section

disableAllStyles.description: Label for the checkbox that turns all enabled styles off.

styleRegexpTestFull.description: RegExp test report: label for the fully matching expressions

appliesHelp.message: 使用“应用对象”控件来限制此部分中的代码所应用到的网址。

editStyleHeading.description: Title of the page for editing styles

editDeleteText.description: Label for the context menu item in the editor to delete selected text

cm_autocompleteOnTyping.description: Label for the checkbox in the style editor.

stylusUnavailableForURLdetails.message: 出于安全原因，浏览器禁止扩展影响内置页面（例如 chrome://version 或 about:addons）以及其他扩展的页面。各浏览器同时也限制介入自己的扩展网站（如 Chrome 网上应用店、Firefox 附加组件）。
stylusUnavailableForURLdetails.description: Sub-note in the toolbar pop-up when on a URL Stylus can't affect

appliesUrlOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a URL

description.message: Stylus 是一个调整网页外观的用户样式管理器。它可让您轻松地为许多热门网站网站安装主题和皮肤。
